channel.title: Emails on rs.io
channel.description: Recent content in Emails on rs.io

item.title: welcome!
item.description: Wow, you made it! Great! I have done some informal polling and found that only those in the very tippy top percentile Wonderfulness, the very-official-psychological-category-that-I’m-definitely-not-making-up-right-now, ever make it to this page. Statistically, if you’re reading this you are among the most wonderful people in the world. This may be hard to believe but, well, that’s science for you. The calculations I’ve done are very rigorous and the results are inarguable: You are wonderful.
